segments.text: Oh man, look at that mess in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's running full blast, and the sink's overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's splashing all over the cabinets and floor— what a disaster!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that woman just stands there, polishing her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, stepping in the puddle without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids— they're sneaking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, stretching way up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting back; he's going to fall any second!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is egging him on, reaching for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is infuriating; someone needs to step in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a recipe for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're breaking the rules like this.
segments.speaker: PAR
